products.name: Rounded Poles and Metal frames
products.description: Rounded Poles and Metal frames for the greenhouse support structures

faqs.question: What is the return policy on the products?
faqs.answer: Our return policy allows returns within 30 days of purchase. Products must be in their original condition and packaging. For more details, please visit our return policy page.

faqs.question: What payment methods are accepted?
faqs.answer: We accept various payment methods including credit/debit cards, PayPal, and bank transfers. Please check our payment options page for a full list.

faqs.question: What are the delivery options?
faqs.answer: We offer standard and expedited shipping options. Delivery times and costs vary depending on your location. For more information, please visit our shipping policy page.

faqs.question: How can I track my order?
faqs.answer: Once your order is shipped, you will receive a tracking number via email. You can use this number to track your order on our tracking page.

faqs.question: Can I cancel my order?
faqs.answer: Orders can be canceled within 24 hours of placement. After this period, cancellations may not be possible. Please contact our customer service for assistance.

faqs.question: What if I have a problem with my order?
faqs.answer: If you encounter any issues with your order, please contact our customer support team. We will assist you in resolving any problems as quickly as possible.
